tool_description: Analyzes genetic markers to determine population ancestry composition and ethnic background percentages of a DNA profile.

profile_id.description: Identifier of the DNA profile to analyze

analysis_method.description: Analysis method: admixture, pca, structure, supervised

confidence_threshold.description: Minimum confidence threshold for ancestry assignments

include_recent_ancestry.description: Whether to include recent ancestry estimates (last 500 years)

error_messages: Profile not found: The specified profile_id does not exist in the system.
Invalid reference populations: Use valid population identifiers from the reference database.
Unsupported analysis method: Use one of [admixture, pca, structure, supervised].
Invalid confidence threshold: confidence_threshold must be between 0.1 and 1.0.
Insufficient markers: Profile lacks enough ancestry-informative markers for analysis.
Analysis failed: Unable to complete ancestry analysis due to data quality issues.
usage: Provide a profile_id and optionally specify reference populations, analysis method, and confidence settings. Returns detailed ancestry composition percentages.

ancestry_percentages.description: Array of ancestry percentages corresponding to reference populations

population_labels.description: Array of population labels corresponding to percentages

confidence_scores.description: Confidence scores for each ancestry assignment

analysis_quality.description: Overall quality assessment of the ancestry analysis
